short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to save memo into your spreadsheet by typing "note <your message>" in Chrome's Omnibox (the address bar).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to save memo into your spreadsheet by typing "note <your message>" in Chrome's Omnibox (the address bar). You will first need to set up this extension first from this extension's icon next to Omnibox.
